questions.prompt: In BG 2.1, what does Krsna see when He looks at Arjuna?
questions.feedback: Krsna sees that Arjuna is sad and confused. Krsna cares about him.

questions.prompt: In BG 2.2, what does Krsna ask Arjuna?
questions.feedback: Krsna asks why Arjuna is acting weak. He wants to help him become strong again.

questions.prompt: In BG 2.7, what does Arjuna ask Krsna to do?
questions.feedback: Arjuna asks Krsna to guide him. He accepts Krsna as his teacher.

questions.prompt: Why is it good that Arjuna asks Krsna for guidance?
choices: Because others tell him to ask
Because Krsna knows what is right
questions.feedback: Krsna knows what is best. Asking a good teacher helps us learn.

questions.prompt: In BG 2.11, what does Krsna say about Arjuna's sadness?
questions.feedback: Krsna says Arjuna should not be sad like this. He will explain why.

questions.prompt: In BG 2.13, what happens to the soul as the body grows?
questions.feedback: The soul stays the same, even when the body changes.

questions.prompt: In BG 2.14, what does Krsna say about happiness and sadness?
questions.feedback: Krsna explains that happiness and sadness do not stay forever.

questions.prompt: Why should we stay calm when happiness or sadness comes?
questions.feedback: Happiness and sadness come and go. Staying calm helps us feel steady.

questions.prompt: In BG 2.20, what happens to the soul?
questions.feedback: Krsna explains that the soul never dies. This brings comfort.
Krsna begins teaching Arjuna and helping him understand. Arjuna is not alone.
